CustomField.description: Used for Checklist to determine if client is ready for AC Cert.
CustomField.formula: if ( Cord_Blood_Cryogenically_Preserved__c = true || Cord_Tissue_Cryogenically_Preserved__c = true || Placenta_Tissue_Cryogenically_Preserved__c = true || Placenta_2_0_Am_Cryogenically_Preserved__c = true, true, false)
CustomField.label: Product(s) have been preserved
